basics.name: Pavel
basics.label: Senior DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: Hello! I'm a Senior DevOps Engineer with expertise in public clouds, automation, and high-available systems. Experienced in optimizing production infrastructure, improving deployment processes, and ensuring system security and stability.

work.name: Sapiens
work.description: Global leader in intelligent insurance software solutions.
highlights: Develop and support a continuous delivery framework using Bash, Python, and GitLab CI.
Assist developers in troubleshooting Oracle Cloud, AWS, Kubernetes, GitLab pipelines,  Auth0,  WebLogic, and Database issues.
Improve deployment stability and frequency by migrating APIs from AWS ECS to Oracle Cloud Kubernetes.
Optimize infrastructure by refactoring Terraform, CloudFormation and Ansible code reducing provisioning time.
Resolve critical security vulnerabilities in OCI and AWS, enhancing overall system security.
Design and implement a Kubernetes production ecosystem.
Collaborate with the R&D department to improve CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure.
Collaborate with SRE team to improve production stability.
